resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75153</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75153</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b119-0f1c-40a2-2845-72f74fd98ced#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Perzsa sírok</string>
            <string language="en">persian graves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">persische Gräber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tombes persanes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sepulturas persas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tombe persiane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περσικοί τάφοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sepulcros persas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Perzsa sírok jellegzetességeinek bemutatása Xerxész perszepoliszi sírjának példáján</string>
            <string language="en">Presenting characteristics of persian graves by the example of the grave of Xerxes in Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Irán,  perzsa,  Parszagadai,  Perszepolisz,  sír,  Kürosz,  Xerxész,  </string>
            <string language="en">Iran, Persia, Parsagadai, Persepolis, grave, Kuros, Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen von von Eigenschaften der persischen 
Gräber durch das Beispiel des Grabs von Xerxes in Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des caractéristiques des tombes 
persanes par l'exemple de la tombe de Xerxes dans Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentando características de sepulturas 
persas pelo exemplo da sepultura de Xerxes em Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentare le caratteristiche delle tombe 
persiane dall'esempio della tomba di Xerxes in Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των χαρακτηριστικών των περσικών τάφων από
το παράδειγμα του τάφου Xerxes σε Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de características de sepulcros 
persas por el ejemplo del sepulcro de Xerxes en Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Iran, Persien, Parsagadai, Persepolis, Grab, Kuros,
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Iran, Perse, Parsagadai, Persepolis, tombe, Kuros, 
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irã, Persia, Parsagadai, Persepolis, sepultura, Kuros,
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Iran, Persia, Parsagadai, Persepolis, tomba, Kuros, 
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιράν, Περσία, Parsagadai, Persepolis, τάφος, Kuros, 
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Irán, Persia, Parsagadai, Persepolis, sepulcro, Kuros,
Xerxes,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75153</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=4124b119-0f1c-40a2-2845-72f74fd98ced&v=1&b=6</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
